metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37206 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Uploading files which contain symlinks may have allowed an attacker totrick a user into submitting sensitive data to a malicious website. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 115.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.3
firefox-geckodriver - 115.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.3
firefox-mozsymbols - 115.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '115.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.3').
